page.title: 08WEST CROSS CENTRE
page.content:
This is a new development of shops, factories and warehouses on the Great West Road where the Firestone factory used to be. There is a large W.H.Smith "Do It All". Wang, Racal and Black and Decker have also moved in. The ware- houses have their numbers in various colours to show the different areas. Yellow 6 is 50,000 square feet and the Bee Gees made a video in it. There is also a squash club with six courts, a public house & a small shopping area.
{THE GATE CENTRE} The Gate Centre is on the South side of the Great West Road where the Coty factory used to be. It consists of smart factories and warehouse units. The Gate Centre office headquarters has central heating and double glazing and is to be let for offices.
